title: Raffles Hotels & Resorts opens Raffles Jaipur to guests
description: Raffles Hotels & Resorts has opened Raffles Jaipur, its second property in India, situated near the city's main attractions and surrounded by the Aravalli Hills. The hotel, crafted from white marble, features 50 guestrooms and suites, each with a balcony and an outdoor soaking tub or plunge pool. It offers Raffles' signature butler service, a 620 square-metre spa, a fitness studio, and a rooftop pool. Later this year, it will introduce an Artisan Trail to connect guests with local artisans.
